block.p: EMDEN--Lois. To our beloved sister-in-law and aunt, you fought till the end for all of us. Your determination and energy inspired us. We will always remember our special times together. Even though distance separated us, we all felt so very close to you. You will forever be in our hearts. Margie, Bobby, Lauren and David

$(6$)EMDEN--Lois. To our special sister-in-law and aunt. You were such a special woman with a beautiful soul. We always loved your phone calls, and you never missed a beat on what was going on in New York in our lives. We will miss you always. With all of our love, The James Emden Family
